data.message: This video is from before I was born... years before. Looks like there was a cps neglect and abuse charge and then after I was born when I was in kindergarten there was one... I remember that one I didn't know about this one... but he shouldn't have been allowed to be around children... because they actually neglected us and specifically he abused us.

replies.message: The person holding my brother is my uncle David who works with and plays bridge with Bill Gates... even if you are a genius you can ignore abuse and neglect and never understand what it is.
